paragraphs.body: Jinora and Kai become more than friends. What else could happen...

paragraphs.body: The Navik Scrolls is fanon series written by IShouldGetAJob.
paragraphs.text: The Navik Scrolls is fanon series written by IShouldGetAJob.

paragraphs.body: It's been almost 20 years since the great Avatar Korra died, and the new Avatar still hasn't been found. Politicians all around the world have demanded an explanation and spiritual leaders have struggled to provide one. The Earth Kingdom was thoroughly searched again and again, to no avail. After an emotional day, a teenager from Republic City finds out why when he receives a visit from the spirit of Avatar Korra herself. His life will never be the same again.
paragraphs.text: It's been almost 20 years since the great Avatar Korra died, and the new Avatar still hasn't been found. Politicians all around the world have demanded an explanation and spiritual leaders have struggled to provide one. The Earth Kingdom was thoroughly searched again and again, to no avail. After an emotional day, a teenager from Republic City finds out why when he receives a visit from the spirit of Avatar Korra herself. His life will never be the same again.

paragraphs.body: Best Hangover Ever 2 is a Kainora fanon one-shot written by prolific one-shot writer, AvatarAang7.
paragraphs.text: Best Hangover Ever 2 is a Kainora fanon one-shot written by prolific one-shot writer, AvatarAang7.

paragraphs.body: After her engagement crashes and burns, Jinora and Kai quickly become friends with benefits. What neither of them could have predicted, was that Jinora would become pregnant. AvatarAang makes each scene, each event and each run of dialogue meaningful, and what he manages to create here is definitely worthy of reading.
